body.p: We the undersigned being a majority of the Justices of the peace of Allen County, summoned to the court house in said county for the purpose of filling the vacancy occasioned by the resignation of N. K. Pope Presiding Judge of the Allen County Court, certify that we have appointed William Mansfield to fill the unexpired term of said N. K. Pope as Presiding Judge of said Allen County Court
Witness our hands as Justices of the Peace aforesaid. this 4th day of March 1862

A. Dodson J. P.
Wm Orr J. P.
Jas. Mattey J. P.
James Ham J. P.
T. R. Hughes J. P.
E. C Moore J. P.
Jesse S. Godley J. P.

I. R. F. Pulliam, Clerk Protem of the Allen Circuit Court certify that the within is a true copy of the certificate of the Justices of the Peace of Allen county appointing William Mansfield Presiding Judge of the Allen County ^court^ in the place of N. K Pope resigned

attest Robt F. Pulliam clk
protem
